awards.title: Provost Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.7 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First Place
awards.summary: My team won first place in Hawai'i Annual Coding Challenge for our innovate web based solution.  See my portfolio site for more details.
